frameDefinitions: A Cognizer calls up an episodic memory of past Experience or an Impression of a Salient_entity formed  on the basis of past experience.
An Agent sets down in permanent form information about the occurrence of a Phenomenon.
An Agent has access to a finite amount of some Resource and uses it in some way to complete a Purpose.
A Device or machine is put in (or out of) service either by a volitional Agent or by a Cause event or force acting on the Device.
An Experiencer is in an undesirable Situation, whose Explanation may also be expressed.
A Killer or Cause causes the death of the Victim.
frameExamples: Kozmo could <t>remember</t> when his modem was the fastest he could buy.
While visiting in Port Alberni, the day before he was diagnosed, we <t>recorded</t> him to have 14 drinks and go to the bathroom 10 times.
I <t>used</t> half of the bag of dirt to plant the roses.
The laborer realized that he <t>activated</t> the machine but did not know how to stop it.
The insurers ended up in the <t>bind</t> of having to pay 15 years' taxes.
listRoleDefinitions: A person who recalls memories of past experience or impressions.
A person or thing that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers as being involved in some state or event or as having some property.
A past event or state that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> witnessed and is now recalling. The <fen>Experience</fen> may be a specific event or state or a vaguer period that is treated as a unit.

A property that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> attributes to the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> based on their past experience of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> or a category to which the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is assigned.
A property or role that a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> actually held and which frames the memories that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers the experience.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the sentient entity that creates a permanent record of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is the entity or situation in the world of which a <fen>Agent</fen> becomes aware.
That feature of the <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
The <fen>Value</fen> of the <fen>Entity</fen> that is recorded for the specified <fen>Attribute</fen>.
An <fen>Entity</fen> for which the <fen>Agent</fen> records the <fen>Value</fen> of an <fen>Attribute</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> creates the record of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> sets down the facts.
The person who depletes a Resource to achieve some Goal
The exhaustible commodity that the <fen>Agent</fen> has access to.
What the <fen>Agent</fen> is attempting to achieve by using the <fen>Resource</fen>.
The amount of the <fen>Resource</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> uses to achieve the <fen>Purpose</fen>.
A more specific description of how the <fen>Purpose</fen> is achieved by spending the <fen>Resource</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Resource</fen> is used.
The physical location where the <fen>Resource</fen> is used.
The <fen>Device</fen> or machine that is in or out of operation.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person who changes the operational state of the <fen>Device</fen>.
<fen>Cause</fen> identifies the non-agentive force that causes the <fen>Device</fen> to begin to operate.
The <fen>Time</fen> when a <fen>Device</fen> is put into or out of operation.
The <fen>Place</fen> in which the <fen>Device</fen> is put into or out of operation.
The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is in an undesirable <fen>Situation</fen>.
This role identifies the undesirable <fen>Situation</fen> the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is in.
Thiis role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Situation</fen> is in effect.
The location where the <fen>Situation</fen> occurs.
The person or sentient entity that causes the death of the <fen>Victim</fen>.
The living entity that dies as a result of the killing.
An inanimate entity or process that causes the death of the <fen>Victim</fen>.
The method or action that the <fen>Killer</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> performs resulting in the death of the <fen>Victim</fen>.
The device used by the <fen>Killer</fen> to bring about the death of the <fen>Victim</fen>.
The point or period of time within which the <fen>Victim</fen> is killed.
The location where the death took place.
listRoleExamples: I will truly miss Delmar and <fex>I</fex> will always remember when his eyes lit up everytime he got ice-cream.
today I saw a sister's exclassmate, and didn't recognise him, I remember <fex>him</fex> taller.
I can still remember <fex>saying the pledge every morning before class in elementary school</fex>, a rare occurrence among elementary school kids nowadays.
I remember Peter <fex>as immensely kind in those first three weeks before I was packed off to boarding school</fex>.
Atulprasad is principally remembered <fex>as a musician and composer</fex>.
I 'll <fex>never</fex> forget being in hospital
Police informed Mr Wong that <fex>they</fex> recorded the attack as a racial incident.
Adams took some very good advice and meticulously recorded <fex>the events that ensued</fex>.

When Mohammed was sentenced to death in the Anti-Terrorism Court in Rawalpindi
the court recorded <fex>his age</fex> as  17 or 18.

In the fiscal year 2000, Nepal's imports from China and Tibet were recorded <fex>at
166.6 million dollars</fex>.
At the time the Army recorded <fex>him</fex> as a married resident of the Town of Two Creeks.
From what the book says, these events were recorded <fex>in the Chamber of Mazarbul</fex> .
<fex>The night lights</fex> were turned on in the secondary school.
Instantly <fex>Sue</fex> activated the commlink on the wall.
He was in his stocking feet while standing in the bayou that formed when <fex>the wind</fex> turned the shower on in that one upstairs bathroom.
My dad turned the lights on for me <fex>at 10 o'clock</fex>
Suddenly, the lights got turned on <fex>on the Jamaica road bridge</fex>.
<fex>The insurers</fex> ended up in a bind.
They found themselves in a quite <fex>a fix</fex>.
<fex>Yesterday's</fex> predicament was a little too exciting.
The trouble <fex>in America</fex> is only going to get worse.
<fex>The rockslide</fex> killed nearly half of the climbers.
The flood exterminated the rats <fex>by cutting off access to food</fex>.
It's difficult to suicide <fex>with only a pocketknife</fex>.
There is no evidence that the royal family was killed <fex>during the destruction</fex> at this site.
Apparently there were two murders <fex>in Atherton</fex> in one week.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: a little over a fortnight later
